~~~~~~~~~~Infectra/Twister~~~~~~~~~~


*Infectra frowns and puts her arms a=
round Airbomber. Mech tears weld up in Infectra's optics*



*Twister sits =
at the same table and just sits there and than her head rises with her opti=
cs not blinking a bit*

Twister:.......alone........

*Twister whispers to =
herself*
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egro=
ups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, August 01, 2000 1:31 AM
  Subject: The End Is Nea=
r...................................................


  Plintissa and Arti=
st look at each other sadly. Why would Dracona do this? She couldn't be rep=
rogrammed, she had a device that could prevent it. Plintissa knew that her =
only friend was against her.

  "Artist, we have to go back and try to conv=
ince Dracona." Plintissa said.

  "I agree, we must face danger, and not fl=
ee. Oops." Artist said. Plintissa snickered.

  "It's okay, Artist, if you =
have to rhyme, then rhyme." Plintissa said. Artist smiled and both of them =
returned to Team Ultima's base.

  Dracona looked to Train Wreck.

  "YOU! =
What are you doing?" Dracona yelled. Train Wreck smiled.

  "Stealing your =
equipment, what does it look like?" Train Wreck said. Dracona growled.

  "=
I thought I reprogrammed you!" Dracona said.

  "Yeah? I used your own inve=
ntion against you! And I used it on my friends, too!" Train Wreck said. Arr=
ow stepped up by Train Wreck. They both looked at Blender and Stronghold. B=
;ender walks up. Stronghold does. Stronghold reaches out and grabs Train Wr=
eck, forcing him down and sticking a rifle to the back of his head. Blender=
 grabs Arrow and drags him down as well.

  "Sorry old friends, but Dracona=
's deal is a BETTER deal!" Blender said.

  "Outside, I don't want any bloo=
d in the base."  Dracona said. Train Wreck and Arrow were drug outside. Tra=
in Wreck suddenly lurched out and hit Blender. Stronghold was hit by Arrow,=
 who had escaped. Stronghold and Blender chased Arrow and Train Wreck into =
the jungle. Stronghold struggles with Train Wreck. Arrow is hit so hard by =
Blender he is put into stasis lock. Train Wreck is beat senseless by both o=
f S.A.B. Inc. (Stronghold and Blender Incompany.) Train Wreck tries all of =
his submissions but Stronghold and Blender always save each other. Train Wr=
eck is held in the air by Stronghold. Blender laughs. Train Wreck is almost=
 dead, his mech fluid is flooding the jungle and is almost drowning Arrow. =
Blender pops a spinning saw blade from his forearm and slams it through Tra=
in Wreck. Stronghold drops Train Wreck and laughs. Blender reaches down and=
 snaps Train Wreck's neck. Blender and Stronghold bow to each other and tur=
n to Arrow. Arrow wakes up for a few seconds and looks at them.

  "Wha?" A=
rrow asks. Stronghold reaches out and looks into a hole. He sweeps all of T=
rain Wreck's mech fluid into it.

  "Sayonara ass!" Blender said. Stronghol=
d jumps into the pit of mech fluid and sticks Arrow's head under. Arrow fin=
ally stops struggling. Stronghold drops Arrow and Blender kicks him. They b=
oth laugh and walk back towards Team Ultima base. They both take out cigars=
 and smoke them in satisfaction of their acompishments.

  Stranato suddenl=
y grabs his chest in pain. Airbomber stares at him. Stranato suddenly start=
s changing form. Stranato now looks a little different. Airbomber screams a=
nd is also slightly morphed.

  "What does this mean?" Airbomber asked Stra=
nato.

  "It means that...Train Wreck and Arrow are dead. I can feel it." S=
tranato said.

  "What? How?" Airbomber said desperatley.

  "It appears ou=
r plan didn't work out." Stranato said.

  "Plan?" Airbomber replies.

  "Y=
es, none of the Radiocns were reprogrammed really." Stranato replied sadly.=


  "Then why are Train Wreck and Arrow dead?" Airbomber asked.

  "They we=
re killed...by Stronghold and Blender." Stranato replied sadly.

  "WHAT! O=
ur friends killed out friends!?!?!?!?" Airbomber said.

  "Sadly, yes, they=
 betrayed us, but out friends, now live on in us." Stranato said.

  "Huh?"=
 Airbomber questioned.

  "Their sparks joined in with ours, we now posses =
their power, the Radicons are no more, let us say goodbye to our good frien=
ds as their spiritual sparks head toward the Matrix. Airbomber and Stranato=
 stood in silence, saluting Arrow and Train Wreck. Airbomber puts his arm a=
round Infectra and cries. Stranato also cannot keep character, and is cryin=
g as well.

  Gangon starts to fade away, realizing he isn't wanted anymore=
.
   
  Lightmare's spark floats slowly toward the Matrix, unsure if she wa=
nts to go there. Arrow and Train Wreck's sparks come by. Lightmare's spark =
notices them. The former Radicons floated into the Matrix. Lightmare's spar=
k lit up and followed them.

  Deemos and Inzoola sit there VERY bored. The=
y couldn't believe that nobody was paying attention to them!

  "I don't be=
lieve this, how can they treat me like this!?" Deemos yelled.

  "If your b=
ored, we could always go find a spot and...be alone." Inzola said. Deemos j=
ust stared coldly. Inzola frowned, she knew Deemos felt unimportant, but ri=
ght now he was making her feel pretty unimportant, too!

  Sinesis is still=
 healing up in the CR Chamber of Team Ultima base.

  Dracona calls Zardus =
on her comm unit.

  "Zardus, this is former Alliance warrior Dracona, I wi=
sh to make...an Alliance with the Alliance." She said.

  Plintissa noticed=
 Stronghold and Blender, she and Artist slowly sneaking up behind them.

  =
Sinister is "Alone" with Blizzard...

-------------------------------------=
